name: @yallaling/web-ai-universal
description: Universal Web AI components for all frameworks

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:components && npm run build:react
scripts.clean: cd core && npm run clean; cd ../components && npm run clean; cd ../react && npm run clean
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd core && npm install && cd ../components && npm install && cd ../react && npm install
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && cd core && npm publish && cd ../components && npm publish && cd ../react && npm publish

author: Yallaling Goudar
